snippet.title: SunnySide - Official Cooking and Food Crafting System Overview Trailer | Women Led Games
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into SunnySide in this brand new trailer for the upcoming farming and life simulator game. The trailer gives us a breakdown of what you can expect from the cooking and food crafting system, including batch cooking, resource gathering through buying items, fishing, harvesting, and food crafting, and more. SunnySide will be available on PC on June 14, 2024, and on PS5 and Xbox Series X/S on July 10, 2024. Find harmony in the Japanese countryside as you help Sparky uncover lost memories in this modern take on the farming and life simulator. Build a thriving homestead, cultivate new relationships, and chase your own happiness in SunnySide.
